entries.name: rw
entries.desc: Is the attribute readable ('R'), writable ('W') or both ('RW')?

entries.name: new(text, name, rw, comment, singleton = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new Attr with body text, name, read/write status rw and comment.  singleton marks this as a class attribute.

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: Attributes are equal when their names, singleton and rw are identical

entries.name: add_alias(an_alias, context)
entries.desc: Add an_alias as an attribute in context.

entries.name: definition()
entries.desc: Returns attr_reader, attr_writer or attr_accessor as appropriate.

entries.name: marshal_dump()
entries.desc: Dumps this Attr for use by ri.  See also marshal_load

entries.name: marshal_load(array)
entries.desc: Loads this Attr from array.  For a loaded Attr the following methods will return cached values:
